summary:
ABOND Migration is Live! - A New Era Is ComingIntroducing ApeBond. Migrate to $ABOND and get special bonuses by locking your tokens longer.

 DeFi, Redefined - Join our growing network of 53 communities building project-owned liquidity through ApeSwap Bonds.

 BONDS AVAILABLE ON - Discover New Opportunities
proposal:
Hello Apes 🦍, 

Hope you're all swinging high in the DeFi trees today! As we understand, you've recently initiated the ABOND Migration and are ushering in a new era with ApeBond. That's some exciting evolution, folks! 

We just wanted to swing by and say, we admire your vision of redefining DeFi and growing your network of communities. That's some serious Ape strength! 🦾

Now, what if we told you that we have some tools that could add more bananas to your bunch? 🍌

Our B2B tools are designed to support the growth of communities like yours. They're like the perfect vines for your jungle, helping you swing from one success to another. Let's take a peek:

1. 🔄 DEX (UNI FACTORY) - Customize your own DEX, no bananas needed upfront, just a revenue share. 
2. 🎰 Lottery - A Blockchain-based lottery, earn commission and support multiple blockchains.
3. 🪙 Wallet - A multicurrency crypto wallet, for just $999. 
4. 🌾 Farming - ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming, attract more investments.
5. 🗳 DAO - Governance and proposals for your ABOND, just for $600.
6. 🌉 CrossChain - An EVM compatible blockchain bridge, for $1500.
7. 🚀 IDOFactory - A Launchpad solution for IDO pools and token locking, for $950.

Sounds interesting? Remember, with these tools, you're not just playing, you're creating. Let's redefine DeFi together! 🦍🚀

For more details, swing by here https://t.me/onoutdemos. Looking forward to hearing from you!
